settings.content: [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/9533691-how-to-correct-price-display-issues-on-your-cart) about common issues with your cart.

settings.label: Custom cart icon
settings.info: Will replace selected icon above. Recommended size 16 x 16px and format should be .svg or transparent .png.
Enable to apply the selected animation to the cart bubble.
settings.label: t:settings_schema.cart_bubble.settings.dbtfy_cart_bubble_enable_animation.label
Layout
settings.info: Drawer will be used on mobile always.

settings.label: Content
settings.default: Do you like cookies? 🍪 We use cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.

settings.label: t:settings_schema.custom_currencies.settings.dbtfy_custom_currencies_supported_currencies.label
settings.default: USD CAD INR GBP AUD EUR JPY

settings.label: Enable functionality for touch screen
settings.info: If both 'show second image on hover' and 'enable carousel on desktop' are enabled, only the carousel will be displayed.

settings.label: Trigger type
settings.info: If Default is set, sticky bar will be displayed when Add-to-cart button is out of scope.

settings.label: t:sections.addons.newsletter_popup.settings.scroll_depth_percentage.label
settings.info: Sticky bar will be displayed when customer is scrolling page by X percentages.

settings.label: Information text below the badges
settings.default: Your payment information is processed securely. We do not store payment details nor have access to your payment information.

settings.info: These settings will work when badge type is set to 'Payment options'. These settings will allow to add custom payment icons in addition to the traditional ones.
These settings will work when badge type is set to 'Icon block columns' or 'Single block rows'.
